alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:21AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI... PEMISCOT...SOUTHEASTERN DUNKLIN...NORTHWESTERN DYER AND SOUTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 AM CST... At 1021 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steele, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Caruthersville, Gosnell, Hayti, Steele, Hayti Heights, Cooter, Deering, Heloise, Holland, Lenox, Ayers, Calumet, Hathaway, Woodland Corner, Tennemo, Boothspoint, Owl Hoot, Yarbro, and Rives. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
